mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.ganbu_name as ganbuName ,a.ganbu_phone as ganbuPhone ,a.ganbu_id_number as ganbuIdNumber ,a.ganbu_photo as ganbuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.ganbu_email as ganbuEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ganbu a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.ganbu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.ganbuName},'%')
and a.ganbu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.ganbuPhone},'%')
and a.ganbu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.ganbuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.ganbu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.ganbuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
